titles.title: Youthsave Act of 1993
Job Corps Youth Sentencing Alternative for Vocational Education and Training Act
YOUTHSAVE Act

To amend the Job Corps program of the Job Training Partnership Act to establish a program to provide education and job training services to youths who have been convicted of non-violent criminal offenses.

bill.summary: 4/21/1993--Introduced. Job Corps Youth Sentencing Alternative for Vocational Education and Training Act (or YOUTHSAVE Act) - Amends the Job Training Partnership Act to establish a separate Youthsave program, under the Job Corps program, to provide education and job training services to eligible youths convicted of non-violent criminal offenses. Authorizes the Secretary of Labor to make agreements with specified entities to establish and operate up to ten Youthsave centers. Authorizes appropriations.
